document_data.name: The Poison Chalice
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Poison Chalice''''' was a novel by an unknown author.
document_data.Description: A work of fiction, ''The Poison Chalice'' told a story of political intrigue set against the backdrop of [[Menzoberranzan]]. It was written in [[Elven language|Elvish]], and was not considered a valuable publication.
document_data.History: As of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], a copy could be found in the guest quarters of Vlonwelv's base in the [[Muiral's Gauntlet]] section of [[Undermountain]].
